msbt.message: You ever hear that if you raise a flower you planted yourself, your wish'll come true when it blooms? I kinda don't believe that, but try it out on these and lemme know what happens!
I went off to a class reunion, and can you believe what I won in a raffle? I'm never gonna need this thing, but you might. If you don't, feel free to sell it or give it away or whatever. Up to you.
I saw these clothes for sale and couldn't pass them up. I used to wear this kinda thing all the time back in my wild days (and low-key still do sometimes) and I bet it'd look rockin' on you.

You making sure to take some time off to catch your breath? I talk a lot about pushing yourself, but do that too much and you'll burn out. So lie down, put on some tunes, and let the stress melt away!

Would you believe I found some furniture I don't use anymore just lying around? How do you LOSE a whole piece of furniture? Life, I'm telling you. Just be careful with it. I don't know where it's been.
I had a buddy give me this a long, long time ago. It's seen a lot of action—a lot of good times and a few bad. Now I'm passing it along to you. Treat it right, or I'll know.

Ever impulse buy something you just know you're never gonna use? Like maybe it's on sale and it looks cool, so you leap without thinking? Who knows what was going through my head...but my loss is your win!

I think everyone's got a relative who's always buying them clothes but has no idea what they like. My aunt sent this cutesy thing, and... that's not me. So she gets a thank- you card, and you get the gear.
OK, I know how this looks, but I promise I'm not trying to get all mushy or anything. I'm sending you pretty plants because I think they look rad and that you might think so too. And that's it.
These pants are awesome. You're gonna love 'em. And I know that they scream , but they also scream way, WAY louder. Enjoy!
